summary: "Stairway to Heaven" is a famous rock song by Led Zeppelin, released in 1971. It's considered one of the best rock songs ever. The song has three parts, starting slow with acoustic instruments, then getting faster and louder with electric instruments and a guitar solo. The lyrics were written by the lead singer, Robert Plant. Even though it was never released as a single, it was very popular on the radio and in 2007, it reached number 37 on the UK Singles Chart.
title: Stairway to Heaven
